description:
Season: 28
Original Air Date: 9/18/2015

Wyatt begins to make headway in his attempt to get Bill to go along with opening a fashion house that will compete with Forrester Creations.  Bill worries that agreeing to Wyatt’s proposition would cause an even greater divide between his two sons.   Knowing that Liam disapproves of the way she dealt with Ivy, Steffy questions the current state of his feelings for her.  Brooke pressures Ridge to tell Caroline the truth.
